messages.subject: Re: Avila Beach
messages.msgSnippet: ***Don t they have a craft/art type festival in the summer down at the beach? Ren*** There are so many craft shows throughout the year, some on the beach
messages.messageBody:
***Don't they have a craft/art type festival in the summer down at the
beach?
Ren***

There are so many craft shows throughout the year, some on the beach
(Santa Barbara has an ongoing sidewalk craft sale every weekend on the
beach), some in parks. So many! I've participated in a few of them,
the nice part is since there are so many of them I get to be picky about
which ones I'll put my stuff in (mostly my stuff is in a local bookstore
right now).

I think there is also a sandcastle building contest on the beaches here
(or maybe that was in the north bay - I can't remember right now).

Anyway, if you ever make back out here, feel free to call (we have an
extra futon!).

Kate
on the central coast where the sun is shining and the temperature is at
least 70. Beach weather!!
